name: Automatin
description:
Automate your tasks with the Figma JavaScript library.


How to use it?

Just write your code as if you were coding a plugin, and click on "Run code".

You can find the documentation here: https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/api/figma/.


Why?

Instead of creating a plugin for each small automation, you can now write it directly in Figma. This means that you no longer have to:

  • create a plugin from scratch, which can be redundant
  • download the Figma Desktop app (because to use the plugin online, the moderators have to give their permission)


The project is open-source. Find the code here: https://github.com/arthur-fontaine/automatin-for-figma/.
